channel.title: VoidanceX RSPS - The Pking Revolution
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/29opoht.png[/img] [b]What is VoidanceX?[/b] VoidanceX is the next-generation pking server that everyone is going to love! A server that thrives for success. VoidanceX is the private server you have been looking for that is VPS Hosted and a reliable place to chill, pk, and have some fun.
[url=http://www.voidancex.com]Website[/url] | [url=http://www.voidancex.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url] |[url=http://www.voidancex.com/client.jar]Download[/url] | [url=http://www.rswebclients.com/vote/VoidanceX]Vote[/url]
[b]Features[/b] Autovote and Autodonation System Completed. Flawless + Revamped Combat System / Switching Oldschool Gameframe Donator Special Restore Item vanishes into the ground when dropped Digging Site Troubles (Quest/Minigame) Re-done Game Engine (Faster downloading) All Chaotics Working Dragon Claws, DFS Effect, Overloads Re-wrote Wilderness Pking Rank System (Pking == kills) Torva, Primal, Primal 2h. Revamped Whip Animations + all items Pk Point Box (A box that will grant a random number pk points upon opening, received by voting) Various bosses for economy based drops
Website Integrated SQL Hiscores + Donate Staff Applications Available vBulletin 4.2.2 w/Inferno Chatbox Spambot protected
[b]Media[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OerA3xN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/O6TyEYa.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fs3G8j7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/v1zM2Wi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eVuV4Te.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jx99Mxi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AukVeK2.png[/img]
[b]I will keep this thread updated as I go on![/b][/CENTER]

item.title: VoidanceX RSPS - The Pking Revolution
item.dc:creator: @meet_the_dr meet the dr
item.description:
@meet_the_dr wrote:

[CENTER]
What is VoidanceX?
VoidanceX is the next-generation pking server that everyone is going to love! A server that thrives for success. VoidanceX is the private server you have been looking for that is VPS Hosted and a reliable place to chill, pk, and have some fun.

Website | Webclient |Download | Vote

Features
Autovote and Autodonation System Completed.
Flawless + Revamped Combat System / Switching
Oldschool Gameframe
Donator Special Restore
Item vanishes into the ground when dropped
Digging Site Troubles (Quest/Minigame)
Re-done Game Engine (Faster downloading)
All Chaotics
Working Dragon Claws, DFS Effect, Overloads
Re-wrote Wilderness Pking
Rank System (Pking == kills)
Torva, Primal, Primal 2h.
Revamped Whip Animations + all items
Pk Point Box (A box that will grant a random number pk points upon opening, received by voting)
Various bosses for economy based drops

Website Integrated SQL Hiscores + Donate
Staff Applications Available
vBulletin 4.2.2 w/Inferno Chatbox
Spambot protected

Media






I will keep this thread updated as I go on![/CENTER]
